name: Nature's Prophet
title: Tequoia
lore: Nature's Prophet is a powerful druid who can teleport anywhere and summon armies of treants.

sprout.name: Sprout
sprout.description: Creates a ring of trees around a target, trapping them inside.

teleportation.name: Teleportation
teleportation.description: Teleports to any point on the map after a channeling delay.

naturesCall.name: Nature's Call
naturesCall.description: Converts trees into treant warriors that attack enemies.

wrathOfNature.name: Wrath of Nature
wrathOfNature.description: Sends a bolt of energy bouncing between enemies, dealing increasing damage.
